articles.author: Kayla Hayempour
articles.title: Marjorie Taylor Greene on 'America First' and Supreme Court weighs Trump's FTC firing: Morning Rundown - NBC News
articles.description: Marjorie Taylor Greene criticizes Donald Trump. The Supreme Court weighs a case on independent agencies. And Notre Dame's College Football Playoff snub.
articles.content: In todays newsletter: Ally-turned-foe Marjorie Taylor Greene criticizes Donald Trump for not delivering on campaign promises. The Supreme Court hears arguments in a case that could impact the structu… [+7561 chars]
